items.question: How do online classes work?
items.answer: Classes are conducted via video conference, with interactive resources that allow real-time problem solving. We use an intuitive platform that enables screen sharing and virtual whiteboard.

items.question: In what language are the classes taught?
items.answer: Classes are bilingual (Portuguese and English), adapted to your proficiency level. We start with more explanations in Portuguese and gradually increase English usage as you adapt.

items.question: How does SAT preparation work?
items.answer: Our SAT preparation focuses on the math section, with specific strategies for solving questions in the American format. We work with practice tests and official College Board material.

items.question: Do you help with school math?
items.answer: Yes! We assist with regular school content, homework, and test preparation, always considering the differences between Brazilian and American methods.
